<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get All Assignees</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/api/incidents/assignee"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve information about all assignees that you can use to monitor team members who can examine incidents.

OK
